Html:
When dragging an editable point with the mouse the chart cursor does not follow if it is set to auto-hide.

Is this a bug or an option somewhere that I've missed?

http://i906.photobucket.com/albums/ac266/McBainUK/Cursordoesnotfollowwhiledragging.png

Hi, this is a bug which currently I don't know how to fix.

Best regards,

Mikhail.
